Detailed Description

Minimize Eproj + alpha Eintr in order to improve overlap of projected and intrinsic state

using the minimization routine donlp2

this is ugly as hell, but it works !

(c) 2003-2008 Thomas Neff

Definition in file MinimizerDONLP2orthogonalvapp.c.

Function Documentation

void calcgradprojectedHamiltonian ( int  nfix,
const SlaterDet *  Qfix,
const SlaterDet *  Q,
const Interaction *  Int,
int  j,
int  par,
int  ifix,
angintegrationpara *  angpara,
double *  eintr,
double *  emulti 
)

Definition at line 1059 of file MinimizerDONLP2orthogonalvapp.c.

References addmulttogradSlaterDet(), calcgradprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(), calcHamiltonianod(), calcOrientedOrientation(), calcSlaterDetAuxod(), copySlaterDet(), dhmulti, dim, dnmulti, expect(), generalizedeigensystem(), hbc, hermiteancopy(), invertangles(), kmixingstates(), multcmat(), multgradSlaterDet(), orientationinverted(), SlaterDetAux::ovlap, rotategradSlaterDet(), rotateSlaterDet(), sorteigenstates(), THRESHKMIX, THRESHMULTI, V, X, and zerogradSlaterDet().

{
  SlaterDet* Qp = Work.Qp;
  SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
  complex double** H = Work.H;
  complex double** N = Work.N;
  complex double** J2 = Work.J2;
  complex double** V = Work.V;
  int* dim = Work.dim;
  gradSlaterDet** dH = Work.dH;
  gradSlaterDet** dN = Work.dN;
  gradSlaterDet* dhmulti = Work.dhmulti;
  gradSlaterDet* dnmulti = Work.dnmulti;

  int n = nfix+1;

#ifdef ORIENTED
  double alpha0, beta0, gamma0;
#endif

  int a, b, k, kp;

  copySlaterDet(Q, Qp);
#ifdef ORIENTED
  calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
  calcOrientedOrientation(Qp, X, &alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
  if (orientationinverted(alpha0, beta0, gamma0, lalpha0, lbeta0, lgamma0)) {
    fprintf(stderr, "... angles inverted\n");
    invertangles(&alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
  }
  fprintf(stderr, "... (alpha, beta, gamma) = (%5.2f, %5.2f, %5.2f)\n",
          alpha0*180/M_PI, beta0*180/M_PI, gamma0*180/M_PI); 
  rotateSlaterDet(Qp, -gamma0, -beta0, -alpha0);

  lalpha0 = alpha0; lbeta0 = beta0; lgamma0 = gamma0;
#endif

  complex double hintr, nintr;
  calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
  nintr = X->ovlap;
  calcHamiltonianod(Int, Qp, Qp, X, &hintr);

  *eintr= creal(hintr/nintr);

  // projected matrix elements, off-diagonals
  int i;
  for (i=0; i<nfix; i++) {
    calcgradprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(Qp, &Qfix[i], Int, j, par, angpara,
                                       H[(n-1)+i*n], N[(n-1)+i*n],
                                       dH[i], dN[i]);
    hermiteancopy(j, H[(n-1)+i*n], H[i+(n-1)*n]);
    hermiteancopy(j, N[(n-1)+i*n], N[i+(n-1)*n]);
  }

  // projected matrix elements for Qp
  calcgradprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(Qp, Qp, Int, j, par, angpara,
                                     H[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n],
                                     dH[n-1], dN[n-1]);

  // K-mixing for Qp
  double ed[j+1];

  kmixingstates(H[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], j, THRESHKMIX,
                ed, V[n-1], &dim[n-1]);

  if (!dim[n-1]) {
    fprintf(stderr, "no good eigenstate for Q !\n");
  }

  // dim[n-1] = 1;

  // ovlap of k-mixing states with intrinsic state

  complex double N2[(j+1)*(j+1)];
  multcmat(N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], N2, j+1);

  complex double hproj[j+1], nproj[j+1], n2proj[j+1], j2proj[j+1];

  for (i=0; i<dim[n-1]; i++) {
    hproj[i] = expect(j+1, H[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], &V[n-1][i*(j+1)]);
    nproj[i] = expect(j+1, N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], &V[n-1][i*(j+1)]);
    n2proj[i] = expect(j+1, N2, &V[n-1][i*(j+1)]);
    j2proj[i] = expect(j+1, J2[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], &V[n-1][i*(j+1)]);
  }

  for (i=0; i<dim[n-1]; i++)
    fprintf(stderr, "Q eigenstate %d: E = %8.3f MeV, n = %8.7f, J2 = %6.3f\n", i, 
            hbc*creal(hproj[i]/nproj[i]), creal(n2proj[i]/(nintr*nproj[i])), creal(j2proj[i]/nproj[i]));

  // build H and N matrix in subspace from K-mixing eigenstates
  
  int dimsub=dim[n-1];
  complex double C[ifix][dimsub];

  int idxa, idxb, kpp;

  for (i=0; i<ifix; i++) {

    for (idxa=0; idxa<dimsub; idxa++)
      C[i][idxa] = 0.0;
    
    for (a=0; a<nfix; a++)
      for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++)
        for (kpp=0; kpp<j+1; kpp++) {

          for (idxa=0; idxa<dimsub; idxa++)
            C[i][idxa] += 
              conj(Work.Vo[kp+a*(j+1)+i*nfix*(j+1)])*
              N[a+(n-1)*n][kp+kpp*(j+1)]*
              V[n-1][kpp+idxa*(j+1)];
        }
  }

  complex double W[dimsub][n*(j+1)];

  for (idxa=0; idxa<dimsub; idxa++) {

    for (a=0; a<n; a++)
      for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
        W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)] = 0.0;

    for (a=0; a<nfix; a++)
      for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
        for (i=0; i<ifix; i++)
          W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)] += -Work.Vo[k+a*(j+1)+i*nfix*(j+1)]*C[i][idxa];

    a=n-1;
    for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
      W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)] = V[a][k+idxa*(j+1)];
  }

  complex double Hsub[dimsub*dimsub], Nsub[dimsub*dimsub];

  for (idxb=0; idxb<dimsub; idxb++)
    for (idxa=0; idxa<dimsub; idxa++) {

      Hsub[idxa+idxb*dimsub] = 0.0;
      Nsub[idxa+idxb*dimsub] = 0.0;
      
      for (b=0; b<n; b++)
        for (a=0; a<n; a++) {

          for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++)
            for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
              Hsub[idxa+idxb*dimsub] +=
                conj(W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)])*
                H[a+b*n][k+kp*(j+1)]*
                W[idxb][kp+b*(j+1)];

          for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++)
            for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
              Nsub[idxa+idxb*dimsub] +=
                conj(W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)])*
                N[a+b*n][k+kp*(j+1)]*
                W[idxb][kp+b*(j+1)];
        }
    }

  // solve eigenvalue problem in subspace

  complex double esub[dimsub];
  complex double Vsub[dimsub*dimsub];
  int dsub;

  generalizedeigensystem(Hsub, Nsub, dimsub, THRESHMULTI, esub, Vsub, &dsub);
  sorteigenstates(dimsub, esub, Vsub, dsub);

  for (i=0; i<dsub; i++)
    fprintf(stderr, "Multiconfig eigenstate %d = %8.3f\n", 
            i, hbc*creal(esub[i]));

  // expectation values for first eigenstate
  complex double* csub = Vsub;

  complex double hmulti, nmulti;
  hmulti = expect(dimsub, Hsub, csub);
  nmulti = expect(dimsub, Nsub, csub);

  *emulti = creal(hmulti/nmulti);

  // gradients

  zerogradSlaterDet(dhmulti);
  zerogradSlaterDet(dnmulti);

  complex double cak, cbkp;

  for (b=0; b<n; b++) {
    a=n-1;
  
    for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++)
      for (k=0; k<j+1; k++) {

        cak = 0.0; cbkp = 0.0;
        for (i=0; i<dimsub; i++) {
          cak += csub[i]*W[i][k+a*(j+1)];
          cbkp += csub[i]*W[i][kp+b*(j+1)];
        }

        addmulttogradSlaterDet(dhmulti, &dH[b][k+kp*(j+1)], conj(cak)*cbkp);
        addmulttogradSlaterDet(dnmulti, &dN[b][k+kp*(j+1)], conj(cak)*cbkp);
      }
  }   

  multgradSlaterDet(dhmulti, 1.0/nmulti);
  addmulttogradSlaterDet(dhmulti, dnmulti, -hmulti/(nmulti*nmulti));

#ifdef ORIENTED
  rotategradSlaterDet(dhmulti, alpha0, beta0, gamma0);
#endif
}

void calcgradprojectedHamiltonianmatrix ( const SlaterDet *  Q,
const SlaterDet *  Qp,
const Interaction *  Int,
int  j,
int  par,
angintegrationpara *  angpara,
complex double *  H,
complex double *  N,
gradSlaterDet *  dH,
gradSlaterDet *  dN 
)

Definition at line 480 of file MinimizerDONLP2orthogonalvapp.c.

References addmulttogradSlaterDet(), calcgradHamiltonianod(), calcgradOvlapod(), calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(), calcSlaterDetAuxod(), copySlaterDet(), dh, dn, dX, getangintegrationpoint(), invertSlaterDet(), M_PI2, angintegrationpara::n, SlaterDetAux::ovlap, Qpp, reinitangintegration(), rotateSlaterDet(), gradSlaterDet::val, X, and zerogradSlaterDet().

{
  SlaterDet* Qpp = Work.Qpp;
  SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
  gradSlaterDet* dh = Work.dh;
  gradSlaterDet* dn = Work.dn;
  gradSlaterDetAux* dX = Work.dX;

  int nang = angpara->n;

  reinitangintegration(Q, Qp, 0, 0, angpara);

  int k,kp;
  for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
    for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
      H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
      N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
      zerogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)]);
      zerogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)]);
    }

  double alpha, beta, gamma, w;

  int i, ip;
  for (i=0; i<nang; i++) {
    copySlaterDet(Qp, Qpp);

    getangintegrationpoint(i, angpara, &alpha, &beta, &gamma, &w);

    rotateSlaterDet(Qpp, alpha, beta, gamma);

    for (ip=0; ip<=1; ip++) {
      if (ip) invertSlaterDet(Qpp);

      calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Qpp, X);
      calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Qpp, X, dX);
      calcgradOvlapod(Q, Qpp, X, dX, dn);
      dn->val = X->ovlap;
      calcgradHamiltonianod(Int, Q, Qpp, X, dX, dh);

      for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
        for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {

          H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
            Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*dh->val;
          N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
            Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*dn->val;

          addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dh, w/2*(ip ? par : +1)*
                                 (j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma));
          addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dn, w/2*(ip ? par : +1)*
                                 (j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma));
        }
    }
  }

}

void calcprojectedHamiltonian ( int  nfix,
const SlaterDet *  Qfix,
const SlaterDet *  Q,
const Interaction *  Int,
int  j,
int  par,
int  ifix,
angintegrationpara *  angpara,
double *  eintr,
double *  emulti 
)

Definition at line 854 of file MinimizerDONLP2orthogonalvapp.c.

References ALLOWEDJ2DEVIATION, calcHamiltonianod(), calcOrientedOrientation(), calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(), calcSlaterDetAuxod(), calcsubspaceoverlap(), copySlaterDet(), dim, expect(), generalizedeigensystem(), hbc, hermiteancopy(), invertangles(), kmixingstates(), multcmat(), orientationinverted(), SlaterDetAux::ovlap, rotateSlaterDet(), sorteigenstates(), THRESHKMIX, THRESHMULTI, V, and X.

{
  complex double** H = Work.H;
  complex double** N = Work.N;
  complex double** J2 = Work.J2;
  complex double** V = Work.V;
  int* dim = Work.dim;

  // Q is intrinsic state to be varied
  // orient properly
  // then calculate needed matrix elements
  // solve eigenvalue problem in smaller subspace spanned by K-mixing eigenstates

  int n = nfix+1;

  SlaterDet* Qp = Work.Qp;
  SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;

#ifdef ORIENTED
  double alpha0, beta0, gamma0;
#endif
   
  complex double hintr, nintr;

  copySlaterDet(Q, Qp);

#ifdef ORIENTED
  calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
  calcOrientedOrientation(Qp, X, &alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
  if (orientationinverted(alpha0, beta0, gamma0, lalpha0, lbeta0, lgamma0))
    invertangles(&alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
  fprintf(stderr, "... (alpha, beta, gamma) = (%5.2f, %5.2f, %5.2f)\n",
          alpha0*180/M_PI, beta0*180/M_PI, gamma0*180/M_PI); 
  rotateSlaterDet(Qp, -gamma0, -beta0, -alpha0);
#endif

  // intrinsic state

  calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);

  if (isnan(X->ovlap)) {
    *eintr = ENERGYPENALTY;
    *emulti = ENERGYPENALTY;
    return;
  }

  nintr = X->ovlap;
  calcHamiltonianod(Int, Qp, Qp, X, &hintr);

  // projected matrix elements, off-diagonals
  int i;
  for (i=0; i<nfix; i++) {
    calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(Qp, &Qfix[i], Int, j, par, angpara,
                                   H[(n-1)+i*n], N[(n-1)+i*n], J2[(n-1)+i*n]);

    hermiteancopy(j, H[(n-1)+i*n], H[i+(n-1)*n]);
    hermiteancopy(j, N[(n-1)+i*n], N[i+(n-1)*n]);
    hermiteancopy(j, J2[(n-1)+i*n], J2[i+(n-1)*n]);
  }

  // projected matrix elements for Qp
  calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(Qp, Qp, Int, j, par, angpara,
                                 H[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], J2[(n-1)+(n-1)*n]);

  // K-mixing for Qp
  double ed[j+1];

  kmixingstates(H[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], j, THRESHKMIX,
                ed, V[n-1], &dim[n-1]);

  if (!dim[n-1]) {
    fprintf(stderr, "no good eigenstate for Q !\n");
  }

  // dim[n-1] = 1;

  // ovlap of k-mixing states with intrinsic state

  complex double N2[(j+1)*(j+1)];
  multcmat(N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], N2, j+1);

  complex double hproj[j+1], nproj[j+1], n2proj[j+1], j2proj[j+1];

  for (i=0; i<dim[n-1]; i++) {
    hproj[i] = expect(j+1, H[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], &V[n-1][i*(j+1)]);
    nproj[i] = expect(j+1, N[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], &V[n-1][i*(j+1)]);
    n2proj[i] = expect(j+1, N2, &V[n-1][i*(j+1)]);
    j2proj[i] = expect(j+1, J2[(n-1)+(n-1)*n], &V[n-1][i*(j+1)]);
  }

  for (i=0; i<dim[n-1]; i++)
    fprintf(stderr, "Q eigenstate %d: E = %8.3f MeV, n = %8.7f, J2 = %6.3f\n", i, 
            hbc*creal(hproj[i]/nproj[i]), creal(n2proj[i]/(nintr*nproj[i])), creal(j2proj[i]/nproj[i]));

  // build H and N matrix in subspace from K-mixing eigenstates
  
  int dimsub=dim[n-1];
  complex double C[ifix][dimsub];

  int idxa, idxb, a, b, k, kp, kpp;

  for (i=0; i<ifix; i++) {

    for (idxa=0; idxa<dimsub; idxa++)
      C[i][idxa] = 0.0;
    
    for (a=0; a<nfix; a++)
      for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++)
        for (kpp=0; kpp<j+1; kpp++) {

          for (idxa=0; idxa<dimsub; idxa++)
            C[i][idxa] += 
              conj(Work.Vo[kp+a*(j+1)+i*nfix*(j+1)])*
              N[a+(n-1)*n][kp+kpp*(j+1)]*
              V[n-1][kpp+idxa*(j+1)];
        }
  }

  complex double W[dimsub][n*(j+1)];

  for (idxa=0; idxa<dimsub; idxa++) {

    for (a=0; a<n; a++)
      for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
        W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)] = 0.0;

    for (a=0; a<nfix; a++)
      for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
        for (i=0; i<ifix; i++)
          W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)] += -Work.Vo[k+a*(j+1)+i*nfix*(j+1)]*C[i][idxa];

    a=n-1;
    for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
      W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)] = V[a][k+idxa*(j+1)];
  }

  complex double Hsub[dimsub*dimsub], Nsub[dimsub*dimsub];

  for (idxb=0; idxb<dimsub; idxb++)
    for (idxa=0; idxa<dimsub; idxa++) {

      Hsub[idxa+idxb*dimsub] = 0.0;
      Nsub[idxa+idxb*dimsub] = 0.0;
      
      for (b=0; b<n; b++)
        for (a=0; a<n; a++) {

          for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++)
            for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
              Hsub[idxa+idxb*dimsub] +=
                conj(W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)])*
                H[a+b*n][k+kp*(j+1)]*
                W[idxb][kp+b*(j+1)];

          for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++)
            for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
              Nsub[idxa+idxb*dimsub] +=
                conj(W[idxa][k+a*(j+1)])*
                N[a+b*n][k+kp*(j+1)]*
                W[idxb][kp+b*(j+1)];
        }
    }

  // solve eigenvalue problem in subspace

  complex double esub[dimsub];
  complex double Vsub[dimsub*dimsub];
  int dsub;

  generalizedeigensystem(Hsub, Nsub, dimsub, THRESHMULTI, esub, Vsub, &dsub);
  sorteigenstates(dimsub, esub, Vsub, dsub);

  for (i=0; i<dsub; i++)
    fprintf(stderr, "Multiconfig eigenstate %d = %8.3f\n", 
            i, hbc*creal(esub[i]));

  // expectation values for first eigenstate
  complex double* csub = Vsub;

  complex double hmulti, nmulti;
  hmulti = expect(dimsub, Hsub, csub);
  nmulti = expect(dimsub, Nsub, csub);

  if (dabs(j2proj[0]/nproj[0] - 0.5*j*(0.5*j+1.0)) > ALLOWEDJ2DEVIATION) {
    *eintr = ENERGYPENALTY;
    *emulti = ENERGYPENALTY;
    return;
  }

  *eintr = hintr/nintr;
  *emulti = creal(hmulti/nmulti);
}

void calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix ( const SlaterDet *  Q,
const SlaterDet *  Qp,
const Interaction *  Int,
int  j,
int  par,
angintegrationpara *  angpara,
complex double *  H,
complex double *  N,
complex double *  J2 
)

Definition at line 319 of file MinimizerDONLP2orthogonalvapp.c.

References calcConstraintJ2od(), calcHamiltonianod(), calcSlaterDetAuxod(), copySlaterDet(), getangintegrationpoint(), invertSlaterDet(), k, angintegrationpara::n, SlaterDetAux::ovlap, Qpp, reinitangintegration(), rotateSlaterDet(), and X.

{
  SlaterDet* Qpp = Work.Qpp;
  SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;

  int nang = angpara->n;

  reinitangintegration(Q, Qp, 0, 0, angpara);

  int k,kp;
  for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
    for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
      H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
      N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
      J2[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0;
    }

  complex double nme, hme, j2me;
  double alpha, beta, gamma, w;

  int i, ip;
  for (i=0; i<nang; i++) {
    copySlaterDet(Qp, Qpp);

    getangintegrationpoint(i, angpara, &alpha, &beta, &gamma, &w);

    rotateSlaterDet(Qpp, alpha, beta, gamma);
    for (ip=0; ip<=1; ip++) {
      if (ip) invertSlaterDet(Qpp);
      
      calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Qpp, X);
      nme = X->ovlap;
      calcHamiltonianod(Int, Q, Qpp, X, &hme);
      calcConstraintJ2od(Q, Qpp, X, &j2me);

      for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
        for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
          H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
            Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*hme;
          N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
            Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*nme;
          J2[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
            Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*j2me;
        }
    }
  }

}

void calcsubspaceoverlap ( int  n,
complex double *  N,
complex double *  V,
int  ngood,
int  imin,
int  imax,
double *  ovl 
)

Definition at line 270 of file MinimizerDONLP2orthogonalvapp.c.

References INVTHRESH, k, l, and pseudoinverse().

{
  if (ngood == 0 || imin==imax) return;

  int nsub=imax-imin;
  complex double Nsub[nsub*nsub], Osub[nsub*nsub];

  int i,j;
  for (j=0; j<nsub; j++)
    for (i=0; i<nsub; i++)
      Nsub[i+j*nsub] = N[(i+imin)+(j+imin)*n];

  pseudoinverse(Nsub, Osub, nsub, INVTHRESH);

  int alpha, k,l;
  double ovlap, norm;

  for (alpha=0; alpha<ngood; alpha++) {
    ovlap = 0.0;
    norm = 0.0;
    for (l=0; l<n; l++)
      for (k=0; k<n; k++) {
        norm += conj(V[k+alpha*n])*N[k+l*n]*V[l+alpha*n];
        for (j=0; j<nsub; j++)
          for (i=0; i<nsub; i++) {
            ovlap += conj(V[k+alpha*n])*N[k+(i+imin)*n]*Osub[i+j*nsub]*N[(j+imin)+l*n]*V[l+alpha*n];
          }
      }
    ovl[alpha] = ovlap/norm;
  }
}

void FORTRAN() egradf ( const double *  x,
double *  gradf 
)

Definition at line 1367 of file MinimizerDONLP2orthogonalvapp.c.

References addmulttogradSlaterDet(), calcgradHamiltonian(), calcgradprojectedHamiltonian(), calcgradSlaterDetAux(), calcSlaterDetAux(), env, FORTRAN, fprintinfo(), hbc, icgf, moveboostSlaterDet(), sigterminate, and writeSlaterDet().

{
#ifndef MPI
  if (sigterminate)
    longjmp(env, 1);
#endif

  copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
  Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);

  // nail to center-of-mass
  moveboostSlaterDet(Min.Q, Work.X);

  double eintr, eortho;

  calcgradprojectedHamiltonian(Min.nfix,
                               Min.Qfix,
                               Min.Q,
                               Min.Int,
                               Min.j, Min.par, Min.ifix, 
                               Min.projpar,
                               &eintr, &eortho);

  // add gradient from intrinsic energy

  calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X);
  calcgradSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X, Work.dX);
  calcgradHamiltonian(Min.Int, Min.Q, Work.X, Work.dX, Work.dh);

  addmulttogradSlaterDet(Work.dhmulti, Work.dh, Min.alpha);

  Min.P->ParaprojectgradSlaterDet(Min.q, Work.dhmulti, gradf);
  FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf++;
  fprintf(stderr, "grad %3d: \tE = %8.3f MeV, Eortho = %8.3f MeV, Eintr = %8.3f MeV\n", 
          FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf, hbc*(eortho+Min.alpha*eintr), hbc*eortho, hbc*eintr);


  if (Min.log && !(FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf % Min.log)) {
    char logfname[255];
    sprintf(logfname, "%s.minovap.%03d.log", Min.logfile, FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf);
    FILE* logfp;
    if (!(logfp = fopen(logfname, "w"))) {
      fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", logfname);
    } else {
      fprintinfo(logfp);
      fprintf(logfp, "# step %3d: \tE = %8.3f MeV, Eortho = %8.3f MeV, Eintr = %8.3f MeV\n", 
              FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf, hbc*(eortho+Min.alpha*eintr), hbc*eortho, hbc*eintr);
      fprintf(logfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
      fprintf(logfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", Min.P->name);
      Min.P->Parawrite(logfp, Min.q);
      fprintf(logfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
      writeSlaterDet(logfp, Min.Q);
      fclose(logfp);
    }
  }  

}

void initWork ( int  nfix,
const SlaterDet *  Qfix,
int  j,
int  par,
angintegrationpara *  AngPar,
const Interaction *  Int,
const SlaterDet *  Q 
)

Definition at line 691 of file MinimizerDONLP2orthogonalvapp.c.

References calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(), expect(), generalizedeigensystem(), hbc, hermiteancopy(), initgradSlaterDet(), initgradSlaterDetAux(), initSlaterDet(), initSlaterDetAux(), kmixingstates(), sorteigenstates(), THRESHKMIX, and THRESHMULTI.

{       
  int n=nfix+1;

  int a,b;
  int k;

  Work.Qp = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
  Work.Qpp = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
  Work.X = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDetAux));
  Work.dX = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDetAux));

  initSlaterDet(Q, Work.Qp);
  initSlaterDet(Q, Work.Qpp);
  initSlaterDetAux(Q, Work.X);
  initgradSlaterDetAux(Q, Work.dX);

  Work.dH = malloc(n*sizeof(void*));
  Work.dN = malloc(n*sizeof(void*));
  for (b=0; b<n; b++) {
    Work.dH[b] = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
    Work.dN[b] = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
    
    for (k=0; k<(j+1)*(j+1); k++) {
      initgradSlaterDet(Q, &Work.dH[b][k]); 
      initgradSlaterDet(Q, &Work.dN[b][k]);
    }
  }
  Work.dh = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
  Work.dn = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));

  Work.dhmulti = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
  Work.dnmulti = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));

  initgradSlaterDet(Q, Work.dh);
  initgradSlaterDet(Q, Work.dn);
  initgradSlaterDet(Q, Work.dhmulti);
  initgradSlaterDet(Q, Work.dnmulti);

  Work.V = malloc(n*sizeof(void*));
  for (a=0; a<n; a++) 
    Work.V[a] = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));

  Work.dim = malloc(n*sizeof(int));
  
  Work.H = malloc(n*n*sizeof(void*));
  Work.N = malloc(n*n*sizeof(void*));
  Work.J2 = malloc(n*n*sizeof(void*));
  for (b=0; b<n; b++)
    for (a=0; a<n; a++) {
      Work.H[a+b*n] = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
      Work.N[a+b*n] = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
      Work.J2[a+b*n] = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
    }

  // calculate diagonal matrix elements for fix configs
  int ia;
  for (a=0; a<nfix; a++) {
    calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(&Qfix[a], &Qfix[a], Int, j, par, AngPar, 
                                   Work.H[a+a*n], Work.N[a+a*n], Work.J2[a+a*n]);

    double efix[j+1];
    kmixingstates(Work.H[a+a*n], Work.N[a+a*n], j, THRESHKMIX,
                  efix, Work.V[a], &Work.dim[a]);

    for (ia=0; ia<Work.dim[a]; ia++)
      fprintf(stderr, "Qfix[%d]:  E[%d] = %8.3f MeV\n", a, ia, hbc*efix[ia]);
  }

  // calculate upper part of off-diagonal matrix elements for fix configs
  for (b=1; b<nfix; b++) {
    for (a=0; a<=b; a++) {
      calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(&Qfix[a], &Qfix[b], Int, j, par, AngPar, 
                                     Work.H[a+b*n], Work.N[a+b*n], Work.J2[a+b*n]);
      hermiteancopy(j, Work.H[a+b*n], Work.H[b+a*n]);
      hermiteancopy(j, Work.N[a+b*n], Work.N[b+a*n]);
    }
  }

  // build H and N matrix in subspace from K-mixing eigenstates

  int i, dimfix=0;

  for (i=0; i<nfix; i++) 
    dimfix += Work.dim[i];

  complex double Hfix[dimfix*dimfix], Nfix[dimfix*dimfix];

  int ib, idxa, idxb, kp;
  idxb=-1;
  for (b=0; b<nfix; b++)
    for (ib=0; ib<Work.dim[b]; ib++) {
      idxb++;
      idxa=-1;
      for (a=0; a<nfix; a++)
        for (ia=0; ia<Work.dim[a]; ia++) {
          idxa++;
      
          Hfix[idxa+idxb*dimfix] = 0.0;
          Nfix[idxa+idxb*dimfix] = 0.0;

          for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++) 
            for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
              Hfix[idxa+idxb*dimfix] += 
                conj(Work.V[a][k+ia*(j+1)])*
                Work.H[a+b*n][k+kp*(j+1)]*
                Work.V[b][kp+ib*(j+1)];

          for (kp=0; kp<j+1; kp++) 
            for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
              Nfix[idxa+idxb*dimfix] += 
                conj(Work.V[a][k+ia*(j+1)])*
                Work.N[a+b*n][k+kp*(j+1)]*
                Work.V[b][kp+ib*(j+1)];
        }
    }   

  // solve eigenvalue problem in subspace
  complex double efix[dimfix];
  complex double Vfix[dimfix*dimfix];
  int dfix;

  generalizedeigensystem(Hfix, Nfix, dimfix, THRESHMULTI, efix, Vfix, &dfix);
  sorteigenstates(dimfix, efix, Vfix, dfix);

  // normalize eigenstates
  double normfix[dfix];
  for (i=0; i<dfix; i++) {
    normfix [i] = expect(dimfix, Nfix, &Vfix[i*dimfix]);

    for (idxa=0; idxa<dimfix; idxa++)
      Vfix[idxa+i*dimfix] /= sqrt(normfix[i]);
  }

  // eigenstates of fix configs
  Work.Vo = malloc(dfix*nfix*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));

  for (i=0; i<dfix; i++) {
    for (a=0; a<nfix; a++)
      for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
        Work.Vo[k+a*(j+1)+i*nfix*(j+1)] = 0.0;

    idxa=-1;
    for (a=0; a<nfix; a++)
      for (ia=0; ia<Work.dim[a]; ia++) {
        idxa++;

        for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
          Work.Vo[k+a*(j+1)+i*nfix*(j+1)] += Vfix[idxa+i*dimfix]*Work.V[a][k+ia*(j+1)];
    }
  }

}

void kmixingstates ( complex double *  H,
complex double *  N,
int  j,
double  thresh,
double *  egood,
complex double *  Vgood,
int *  ngood 
)

Definition at line 211 of file MinimizerDONLP2orthogonalvapp.c.

References generalizedeigensystem(), k, l, MINNORMKMIX, V, and val.

{
  complex double e[j+1];
  complex double V[(j+1)*(j+1)];
  int d;

  generalizedeigensystem(H, N, j+1, thresh, e, V, &d);

  // we got d eigenstates, filter out the noise
  // see sortEigenstates

  double norm[d];
  int i, k, l;

  for (i=0; i<d; i++) {
      norm[i] = 0.0;
      for (l=0; l<j+1; l++)
        for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
          norm[i] += conj(V[k+i*(j+1)])*N[k+l*(j+1)]*V[l+i*(j+1)];
    }

  double maxnorm = 0.0;
  for (i=0; i<d; i++)
    maxnorm = fmax(maxnorm, creal(norm[i]));

  // merits

  struct merit {
    double val;
    int idx;
  } merits[d];

  for (i=0; i<d; i++) {
    merits[i].idx = i;
    if (creal(norm[i]) < MINNORMKMIX*maxnorm)
      merits[i].val = -100000.0;
    else
      merits[i].val = -creal(e[i]);
  }

  // sort according to merits value
  qsort(merits, d, sizeof(struct merit), cmpmerit);

  // now write good eigenvalues and eigenvectors into egood, Vgood

  i=0; while(i<d && merits[i].val > -100000.0) {
    egood[i] = -merits[i].val;
    for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
      Vgood[k+i*(j+1)] = V[k+merits[i].idx*(j+1)];
    i++;
  }
  *ngood = i;

}

void FORTRAN() setup0 ( void   ) 

Definition at line 1489 of file MinimizerDONLP2orthogonalvapp.c.

References APOS, FORTRAN, and NGAUSS.

{
  int i;

  FORTRAN(o8dim).n = Min.q->n;
  FORTRAN(o8dim).nh = Min.nconst;
  // in case of FMD parametrization use bound constraints for Re{a}
  if (!strcmp(Min.P->name, "FMD")) {
    FORTRAN(o8dim).ng = Min.q->ngauss;
    for (i=0; i<Min.nconst+1; i++) {
      FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][0] = -1;
      FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][1] = 0;
      FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][2] = 0;
    }
    for (i=0; i<Min.q->ngauss; i++) {
      FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][0] = 1;
      FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][1] = i*NGAUSS+APOS+1;
      FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][2] = 1;
    }
    for (i=0; i<Min.q->ngauss; i++) {
      if (Min.q->x[i*NGAUSS+APOS] < 0)
        Min.q->x[i*NGAUSS+APOS] = 1.0+1.0*rand()/RAND_MAX;
    }
  } else
    FORTRAN(o8dim).ng = 0;
  FORTRAN(o8stpa).analyt = 1;
  FORTRAN(o8stpa).cold = 1;
  FORTRAN(o8par).tau0 = 20.0;
  FORTRAN(o8par).del0 = 1.0;
  FORTRAN(o8rst).nreset = 20;
  FORTRAN(o8stpa).silent = 1;

  for (i=0; i<Min.q->n; i++)
    FORTRAN(o8xdat).x[i] = Min.q->x[i];
}
